name: Marble Partner
description:
This is a role playing game

In this world, in addition to humans, there are still many elves living.
They are cute, smart, strong, and individual
They have their own unique skills
Is a good partner of mankind

Some humans, they ventured with the elves to participate in the competition.
Become stronger and have deeper feelings.
They are elf trainers.




Elf

There are more than 300 kinds of elves in the game, including evolutionary.


Attributes

The game has,
Fire, water, earth, wind, thunder, ice, light, dark, no
9 attributes
Mutual restraint



skill

Wizards can get new skills by upgrading
Each wizard can only have up to 4 skills
When there are more than 4 skills, you need to choose one to discard

Every skill uses energy
Skills cannot be used when there is no energy
At this point you can use the life-threatening "death"



Combat system

Battle in the marble mode.
After selecting the attack, the elf will eject like a marble, hitting an opponent, or a wall.
Semi-real-time, in the battle, each elf has its own timing progress bar.
When the progress bar is full, you can act.
Can choose, attack, goods, exchange teammates, run away



Friendship

Every elf has friendship skills
In battle, when teammates collide, teammates will trigger friendship skills.



Capture system

In the battle, encounter wild elves.
We can use props to capture wild elves.
Become our companion.
When the wild elf becomes weaker, the success rate is higher.
